thread.title: A mathematician explains the best way to cut a bagel
thread.title_full: A mathematician explains the best way to cut a bagel

author: Corey Protin and Alana Kakoyiannis
title: A mathematician explains the best way to cut a bagel
text:
embed 
We wanted to know if it was possible to use math to make a delicious, mess free bagel. So we brought in Eugenia Cheng , a mathematician and the author of " Beyond Infinity ." She's even been on the " The Late Show with Stephen Colbert " before. 
Cheng showed us that we can cut a bagel so it looks like a MÃ¶bius strip, which is a mathematical structure that only has one side. Here's how you can do it too.
